title: Peak Pro 6.0.4 for Mac (Intel) Crack only

Message from the Author:
This crack was requested by a member of the Pirate Bay community. It was a valuable exercise for me as I had to learn about how Carbon applications work. I had a tough time finding the place where to bypass the 5 minute recording protection, but eventually succeeded there as well. Enjoy!
